About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

I enjoy learning about and keeping up with the latest technologies, including databases, front-end frameworks, modern programming languages, DevOps tools, AI and blockchain development. I hope to one day architect a Big Data pipeline and data lake ETL for a machine learning solution. My hobbies include snowboarding, rock climbing and jiu jitsu. Game of Thrones fan.

Northrop Grumman

Software & DevOps Engineer
Implemented REST API with telemetry and orbit determination backend. Designed database schemas. Standardized deployment strategies across multiple environments. Created unit and integration tests. Contributed to UI components. Started 2021

US Navy

Petty Officer First Class & Cyber Security Analyst
Performed defensive cyber operations and network forensic analysis. Recommended and enforced information assurance policies. Fused cyber threat intelligence. Ended 2022
